body_html: I think the issue is that lazy_init.cpp is only compiled if cuda is enabled; this makes some sense since that's the usual pattern with things in torch/csrc/cuda/; To avoid confusion we should just move that to torch/csrc/utils/cuda_lazy_init and unconditionally compile it.
body_text: I think the issue is that lazy_init.cpp is only compiled if cuda is enabled; this makes some sense since that's the usual pattern with things in torch/csrc/cuda/;  To avoid confusion we should just move that to torch/csrc/utils/cuda_lazy_init and unconditionally compile it.
body: I think the issue is that lazy_init.cpp is only compiled if cuda is enabled; this makes some sense since that's the usual pattern with things in torch/csrc/cuda/;  To avoid confusion we should just move that to torch/csrc/utils/cuda_lazy_init and unconditionally compile it.
